sentences.en: "Let's invite her to dinner." — "Over my dead body!"
sentences.cn: “我们请她来吃晚饭吧。”——“除非我死了！”

sentences.en: A lamp hung over the table.
sentences.cn: 一盏灯悬挂在桌子上方。

sentences.en: As he talked, an airforce jet screamed over the town.
sentences.cn: 他谈话时，一架军用喷气式飞机在镇子上空呼啸而过。

sentences.en: Can we talk about this over dinner?
sentences.cn: 我们能否边吃饭边谈这个问题？

sentences.en: Come on over, we've got lots of the old gang here.
sentences.cn: 过来吧，好多老朋友都在这儿。

sentences.en: Come over here and see what I’ve found.
sentences.cn: 到这里来，看看我找到了什么。

sentences.en: Dave, the pianist, played it over a couple of times.
sentences.cn: 演奏钢琴的戴夫将这支曲子反复弹了两三遍。

sentences.en: drivers who go over the speed limit
sentences.cn: 超速驾驶的司机

sentences.en: exceptional service over and above what normally might be expected.
sentences.cn: 通常服务之外的特殊服务。

sentences.en: He had a fever last night, but he seems to be over it now.
sentences.cn: 昨晚他发烧，但现在好像已经好了。

sentences.en: He moved carefully over what remained of partition walls.
sentences.cn: 他小心翼翼地跨过残余的隔墙。

sentences.en: I spent the whole day over at Gabby’s place.
sentences.cn: 我一整天都在加比家。

sentences.en: I think we’re over the worst of the crisis now.
sentences.cn: 我想我们现在已经熬过了最危急的关头。

sentences.en: I went over (= crossed the room, street etc ) to say hello, but Vincent didn’t recognize me.
sentences.cn: 我走过去打招呼，但文森特没有认出是我。

sentences.en: I’m over him now (= I am no longer in love with him ).
sentences.cn: 我现在已经不在乎他了。

sentences.en: It's just not enough money to start life over.
sentences.cn: 这些钱根本不够用来开始全新的生活。

sentences.en: Legs of pork were cured and smoked over the fire.
sentences.cn: 在火上熏制猪腿。

sentences.en: Let's get the shopping over with. Are we over with all this shopping?
sentences.cn: 让我们购完物品。我们购到需要的物品了吗?

sentences.en: Meanwhile, melt the white chocolate in a bowl suspended over simmering water.
sentences.cn: 同时，把碗置于微沸的水上，将白巧克力放入碗中使其熔化。

sentences.en: Over a given period, the value of shares will rise and fall.
sentences.cn: 股票的价值在某一特定的时期内会有涨跌。

sentences.en: Over a period of ten years he stole a million pounds from the company.
sentences.cn: 他在10年间从公司偷走了100万英镑。

sentences.en: Share prices and trading have been dulled by worries over the war.
sentences.cn: 股票价格和交易因人们对战争的忧虑而走低。

sentences.en: She leaned over the desk to answer the phone.
sentences.cn: 她身子探过桌面接电话。

sentences.en: Students all over the country are facing an uncertain future.
sentences.cn: 全国各地学生前途未卜。

sentences.en: Sybil has never got over the shock of her mother’s death.
sentences.cn: 西比尔一直未能从母亲去世的打击中恢复过来。

sentences.en: The bus is said to have over-turned and fallen into a ravine.
sentences.cn: 据说巴士发生翻车，跌进了峡谷。

sentences.en: The car passed over the body twice, once backward and then forward.
sentences.cn: 那辆车把那人来回轧了两次，先是倒着轧的，再是往前开着轧的。

sentences.en: The Chief Constable's clipped tones crackled over the telephone line.
sentences.cn: 电话线那头噼里啪啦地传来警察局长短促的声音。

sentences.en: The Japanese were producing over 100 million tons of steel.
sentences.cn: 日本的钢产量超过了1亿吨。

sentences.en: The Marshal stepped over the vacuum-cleaner and stumped out of the room.
sentences.cn: 元帅迈过真空吸尘器，脚步沉重地走出了房间。

sentences.en: The sign over the door said ‘Mind your head’.
sentences.cn: 门上方的警示牌写着“小心碰头”。

sentences.en: The wall was crumbling where children had climbed over.
sentences.cn: 墙上孩子们爬过的地方正在崩坍。

sentences.en: There are only three canoes so some people will have to swim over.
sentences.cn: 仅有三条独木舟，所以一部分人得游过去。

sentences.en: toys suitable for children over the age of three
sentences.cn: 适合3岁以上儿童的玩具

sentences.en: We could drive over to Oxford this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 今天下午我们可以开车到牛津去。

sentences.en: We watched a helicopter flying low over the harbour.
sentences.cn: 我们看着一架直升机在港口低空飞行。

sentences.en: we were over the worst.
sentences.cn: 我们渡过了最困难的一关。

sentences.en: Will you be home over the summer vacation?
sentences.cn: 暑假期间你在家吗？

sentences.en: You really should come over and see our new house.
sentences.cn: 你真的该过来看看我们的新房子。

words.tran_cn: 过于老化；商品过剩；人工时效过度
越过,在...对面,从一边到...的另一边,通过...的通讯途径
额外地,过分地,太,另外,也

phrases.tran_cn: 到处，遍及；浑身；全部结束
从…影响下恢复过来，渡过
把（不愉快或难做的事）先做完
复习，重温；仔细检查；转变；润色
招待某人在家吃饭 (或饮酒等)
adv. 一再地；反复不断地
煎半熟蛋；煎两面；结束容易

trans.tran_cn: 倒下，折起来，翻转，交出，在…，向一边，穿过，完全覆盖，大于，很，剩余，在上方，仔细地，再，结束，改变，完毕
trans.tran_en: in or to a particular house, city etc

trans.tran_cn: 在…的上方，从一边至…的另一边，在…的对面，翻越，遍及，恢复过来，支配，胜过，多/大于，在…期间，度过，关于，通过，更喜欢
trans.tran_en: above or higher than something, without touching it
